creator: i.galic@brainsware.org
text:
"The Apache Tomcat Project is proud to announce the release of version 6.0.29 of Apache Tomcat. This release includes bug fixes over Apache Tomcat 6.0.29."

I suppose the last part should be 6.0.28

creator: markt@apache.org
text: Thanks for the report. This has been fixed and should sync in the live servers in the next hour or so.
